message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. This is a great deal, considering its value to you is $8000.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I really like the product, but I'm on a tight budget.

I understand you're on a tight budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $11000. This is still a great deal for you, considering the product's value to you is $8000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to pay $9500. Can we meet somewhere in the middle?

I see you're getting closer to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you at $10500. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $10000. I think that's a fair price for both of us. Can we agree on that?
